attributes.action: change Bredbury train station to wheelchair acessible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many people in the Bredbury area in Stockport who find it difficult to acess this station as it is not acessible to wheel chair users, prams or people who suffer with poor mobility. We are a disability group called 'Out and About' and are asking for your help please.

rejection.details: Please use a full, correct name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
